mdq:check.name: Entity Identifier Type Present
mdq:check.description: Check that an entity identifier type exists.
mdq:check.code:
def call(): global output global status
import metadig.variable as mvar
# An attribute definition is not present if 'resourceIdentifierType' not in globals() or resourceIdentifierType is None: output = "A entity identifier type was not found." status = "FAILURE" return False
if (mvar.isBlank(resourceIdentifierType)): output = "The entity identifier type is blank." status = "FAILURE" return False else: # Check if entity identifier type is a single string or list if(isinstance(entityIdentifierType, unicode)): output = u"The entity identifier type '{}' was found.".format(entityIdentifierType) else: output = u"The entity identifier type '{}' was found.".format(entityIdentifierType[0])
status = "SUCCESS" return True
